title: Redeemed: Part IV
description: **MATURE CONTENT-18 AND OVER ONLY**THIS IS A SHORT STORY ROCK AND ROLL NOVELLA!Rock star Ryder Matthews is on guard now more than ever following a tragic death of someone close to his girlfriend Everleigh Stone. Her ex boyfriend had become more of a threat than anyone had realized and with the help of his band, Bad Blooded Rebel, he is trying to keep Everleigh and everyone else he cares about safe until Scott Adams is brought down.After a tragic event in her hometown by her ex boyfriend, Everleigh Stone is terrified not just for her life, but that of everyone she loves. She feels guilt over what is happening and feels powerless to stop any of it.When Scott finally makes his move, it is a desperate race against the clock to find Everleigh before the unthinkable happens. Will Ryder be able to save the woman he loves from danger and have the happily ever after they both deserve?**THIS IS THE CONCLUSION TO THE BAD BLOODED REBEL SERIES OF NOVELLAS AND IS NOT A STAND ALONE NOVELLA. YOU MUST READ REBEL, ROGUE, AND RENEGADE FIRST!**
author: Mellie George
